title: AI Practical Skills Enhancement: Digital Educational Serious Game Design Course: Game-Based Science Instruction

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can design serious games by integrating game design elements with science education objectives.
Learners can collaborate with peers and mentors in a PBL environment to develop prototypes for educational digital games.
Learners iteratively improve the balance between educational effectiveness and entertainment elements in game design through formative assessments.
Learners can analyze the alignment between science education content and game mechanics and suggest improvements based on evaluation criteria.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
